member.name: COMPOSITION_TARGET_ID
member.summary: Contains information about a composition render target.

member.name: COMPOSITION_TARGET_ID.displayAdapterLuid
member.summary: The locally unique identifier (LUID) of the display adapter to which the monitor is connected.

member.name: COMPOSITION_TARGET_ID.renderAdapterLuid
member.summary: The locally unique identifier (LUID) of the render adapter.

member.name: COMPOSITION_TARGET_ID.vidPnSourceId
member.summary: The unique ID of the video present source.

member.name: COMPOSITION_TARGET_ID.vidPnTargetId
member.summary: The unique ID of the video present target.

member.name: COMPOSITION_TARGET_ID.uniqueId
member.summary: A unique identifier for this COMPOSITION_TARGET_ID.
